instruction: Explain how modern technology has changed the education system.
output: Modern technology has changed the education system in several ways. Firstly, technology has enabled students to access a vast array of digital learning tools, from online courses to interactive video lectures. This can help students to acquire knowledge in flexible ways. Secondly, technology has enabled students to connect with students around the world and share perspectives, enabling them to develop a broader, global understanding of the world. Finally, technology has enabled teachers to give customized feedback, better track student progress, and enhance the overall learning experience.
